PHIL 2.5 þata auk fraþjaidau in izwis, þatei jah in Xristau Iesu, PHIL 2.6 saei in gudaskaunein wisands ni wulwa rahnida wisan sik galeiko guda, PHIL 2.7 ak sik silban uslausida, wlit skalkis nimands, in galeikja manne waurþans, PHIL 2.8 jah manaulja bigitans swe manna.
gahaunida sik silban, waurþans ufhausjands attin und...
...PHIL 2.22 þatei swe attin barn miþskalkinoda mis in aiwaggeljon.
PHIL 2.23 þanuh nu wenja sandjan, biþe gasaiƕa ƕa bi mik ist, suns.
PHIL 2.24 aþþan gatraua in fraujin, þammei jah silba sprauto qima.
PHIL 2.25 aþþan þarb munda, Aipafraudeitu broþar jah gawaurstwan jah gahlaiban meinana, iþ izwarana apaustulu jah andbaht þaurftais meinaizos sandjan du izwis;
...PHIL 2.26 in þize hausideduþ ina siukan.
PHIL 2.27 jah auk siuks was neƕa dauþau, akei guþ ina gaarmaida;
aþþan ni þatainei ina, ak jah mik, ei gaurein ana gaurein ni habau.
PHIL 2.28 sniumundos nu insandida ina, ei gasaiƕandans ina aftra faginoþ jah ik hlasoza sijau .

PHIL 2.29 andnimaiþ nu ina in fraujin miþ allai fahedai jah þans swaleikans swerans habaiþ, PHIL 2.30 unte in waurstwis Xristaus und dauþu atneƕida, ufarmunnonds saiwalai seinai, ei usfullidedi izwar gaidw bi mein andbahti.
PHIL 3.1 þata anþar, broþrjus meinai, faginoþ in fraujin;
þo samona izwis meljan mis sweþauh ni latei, iþ izwis þwastiþa.
PHIL 3.3 aþþan weis sium bimait, weis ahmin guda skalkinondans jah ƕopandans in Xristau Iesu, janni in leika gatrauam, PHIL 3.4 jah þan ik habands trauain jah in leika.
jabai ƕas anþar þugkeiþ trauan in leika, ik mais:

PHIL 3.5 bimait ahtaudogs, us knodai Israelis, kunjis Bainiameinis, Haibraius us Haibraium, bi witoda Fareisaius, PHIL 3.6 bi aljana wrakjands aikklesjon, bi garaihtein þizai sei in witoda ist, wisands usfairina.
PHIL 3.7 akei þatei was mis gawaurki, þatuh rahnida in Xristaus sleiþa wisan.

PHIL 3.8 aþþan sweþauh all domja sleiþa wisan in ufarassaus kunþjis Xristaus Iesuis fraujins meinis, in þizei allamma gasleiþiþs im jah domja smarnos wisan allata, ei Xristau du gawaurkja habau, PHIL 3.9 jah bigitaidau in imma ni habands meina garaihtein, þo us witoda, akei þo þairh galaubein Xristaus Iesuis, sei us guda ist garaihtei ana galaubeinai, PHIL 3.10 du kunnan ina jah maht usstassais is jah gamainduþ þulaine is,
miþkauriþs was dauþau is, PHIL 3.11 ei ƕaiwa gaqimau in usstassai us dauþaim.
PHIL 3.12 ni þatei ju andnemjau aiþþau ju garaihts gadomiþs sijau, aþþan afargagga, ei gafahau in þammei gafahans warþ fram Xristau.
PHIL 3.13 broþrjus, ik mik silban ni nauh man gafahan;
þaim aftra ufarmunnonds, iþ du þaim þoei faura sind, mik ufþanjands, bi mundrein afargagga afar sigislauna þizos iupa laþonais gudis in Xristau Iesu.
PHIL 3.15 swa managai nu swe sijaima fullawitans, þata hugjaima;
jah jabai ƕa aljaleikos hugjiþ, jah þata izwis guþ andhuljiþ.
PHIL 3.16 aþþan sweþauh du þammei gasnewum, ei samo hugjaima ,
PHIL 3.17 miþgaleikondans meinai wairþaiþ, broþrjus, jammundoþ izwis þans swa gaggandans, swaswe habaiþ frisaht unsis.

PHIL 3.18 unte managai gaggand þanzei ufta qaþ izwis, iþ nu jaggretands qiþa þans fijands galgins Xristaus, PHIL 3.19 þizeiei andeis wairþiþ fralusts, þizeiei guþ wamba ist jah wulþaus in skandai ize, þaiei airþeinaim fraþjand.

PHIL 3.20 iþ unsara bauains in himinam ist, þaþroei jah nasjand usbeidam fraujan Iesu Xristu, PHIL 3.21 saei inmaideiþ leika hauneinais unsaraizos du ibnaskaunjamma leika wulþaus seinis bi waurstwa, unte mag jah ufhnaiwjan sis alla.
